content: मरीचिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [मृ-ईचि <ls>Uṇ. 4. 70</ls>] {@--1@} A ray of light; न चंद्रमरीचयः <ls>V. 3. 10</ls>; सवितुर्मरीचिभिः <ls>Rs. 1. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 13</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 4.</ls> {@--2@} A particle of light. {@--3@} Light. {@--4@} Mirage. --चिः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Prajāpati, one of the ten patriarchs created by the first Manu, or one of the ten mindborn sons of Brahman; he was father of Kaśyapa. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a lawgiver. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kṛṣṇa. {@--4@} A miser.
